basics.name: Christine V
basics.label: Customer Support Manager
basics.summary:
I am a generalist that thrives in a startup environment where I can learn new
skills and deliver solutions for both customers and peers.

Depending on the needs of an organization I happily help fill gaps and keep
things moving including customer support requests, documentation, security training, QA, and planning new product features.

While I am always trying to pursue improving leadership and technical
skill sets most of my experience revolves around listening to customers,
understanding their pain points, and learning whatever is required to help
them be successful.

For my next role I want to continue to develop engineering skill sets, so I can
solve more problems myself, more opportunity to participate in leadership,
cross-team communication, and general problem solving.

work.name: Matterport
work.summary:
Continued all duties listed in previous role, plus:
Be the escalation point of contact for Level 1 and Level 2 agents.
Lead a weekly meeting with the point of contacts in QA to report bugs and receive release updates. Document notes for the Support team to reference.
Pioneered the support for how to resolve complicated model navigational issues using an internal CLI tool. This has now become it's own role/team under Support.

work.name: Matterport
work.summary: Provide account, technical, and SDK support for customers via email, chat, and phone (Zendesk).   Consistently solve more tickets than the daily stretch goal. Assist with managing tickets for both Level 1 and 2 to determine best course of action to solve quickly, but correctly. Collaborate with QA, developers, and management to provide best support to customers. Create/edit internal process documents and assist with editing the support documentation for customers. Report bugs and determine next steps with engineering in a weekly meeting, then report back to the team.

work.name: Pebble Tech
work.summary: Provide technical support on escalated customer requests. Writing macros for use by Tier 1 support for reoccurring issues. Mentoring Tier 1 to lessen escalated cases. Find issues by doing testing and QA personally. Filing bug reports and coordinating with multiple engineering teams to find solutions. Experience with iOS, Android, JIRA database, and support software Desk.com.

work.name: Whole Foods Market
work.summary: Works with a team to satisfy and delight customers. Help customers with any questions or problems. Handles money and transactions. Cleans work space.

work.name: Animal Hospital at Baldwin Park
work.summary: Helped clients understand treatments and boarding. Invoiced the care of clients' pets. Administered food and medicine. Bathed animals; cleaned kennel and clinic daily.

work.name: South Orlando Animal Hospital
work.summary: Answered any questions the clients had about boarding; followed any specific requests client had for their pet. Cared for dog and cat boarders including feeding, play time, cleaning, bathing, administering medications, restraining. Gave kennel tours; helped DVMs and vet technicians.

work.name: PetSmart
work.summary: Helped customers find items, solve problems, and confirmed the customers left satisfied. Handled money and transactions; cleaned work space.

volunteer.summary: Active member that uses shells on Hashbang's web hosting system. Admin for the IRC channels and shell accounts under Hashbang.
Cared and monitored resident animals. Logged detailed behavior of animals. Ensured proper enrichment. Cleaned exhibits.
Answered questions from guests about the animals. Shadowed keepers at venues and assisted in projects. Prepared diets, fed out, cleaned exhibits.
Answered questions from guests about the animals. Checked health and behavior of animals. Prepared diets and fed out; cleaned exhibits.

Prepared clientsâ€™ and their pets for exams in the veterinarian clinic. Observed surgeries and assisted in post-surgery. Administered vaccines and medicines. Restrained animals during routine check-ups.
Mentored students with dissections and school work. Prepared dissections and labs including tests. Cleaned the lab. Worked directly with the professor in charge.

certificates.name: Customer Service: Problem Solving and Troubleshooting

projects.name: Screenshot
projects.summary: Simple utility to save a screenshot, upload to your server, and copies url to clipboard to paste wherever.

projects.name: Wild and Radiant Me
projects.summary: Blog based in Jekyll and working in the terminal. Writing about technical/art projects; personal learning; graphic design; web development.

projects.name: Twinkle
projects.summary: Simple program in C allowing a set of LEDs to "twinkle" randomly and at different brightness's. These LEDs are part of a painting and they are the stars.
